Yep, I have gone through cleaning up my scenarios.  Things that I 
changed were among the following:

1)scenario design - inconsisent tiles were fixed
2)placement of characters - a couple of scenarios had character 
locations changed
3)expansion of existing scenarios - a couple of them had maps redone 
and characters were added

Of course, you can find out which scenarios were changed by looking at 
the last modified date of the files.
